The Apex Beings

The Arashi

A definitive census of entities whose essence has touched the divine. These are the living stormsâ€”the Arashi.

#0
Unknown Unknown

Unknown

Arashi Rank #0. Identity unknown. No confirmed sighting. Theorized to be an entity operating at Meta-level power, above even Arashi #1 Dark Paladin.

â†’
#1
Unknown Unknown

Dark Paladin

Arashi Rank #1. The most powerful operational villain in Criozevan. Lives in Icogas, the unstable magic nexus city. Death Eye ability identifies fatal vulnerabilities in any observed target.

â†’
#2
Unknown Folkwynd (Human)

Berserk

Arashi Rank #2. Folkwynd human. Lives in Oniofast. Domain ability converts incoming damage into amplified power. The most consistently aggressive Arashi member. Trained briefly under Sunlee before the Arashi.

â†’
#3
Unknown Folkwynd (Human)

Nebbio

Arashi Rank #3. Folkwynd human. Operates in Suudon's mist swamps. Mist Domain makes them physically intangible at will. The most surveillance-resistant Arashi member. Has a working relationship with Golem King's territory.

â†’
#4
Unknown Sharkai

Rabuka

Arashi Rank #4. Sharkai. Lives in Glaril. Blood Current Domain detects all living organisms by blood and manipulates liquid currents. The Arashi's primary maritime threat.

â†’
#5
Unknown Unknown (appears Folkwynd)

Velho

Arashi Rank #5. Unknown location. Realm Expansion ability ages the surrounding environment into a ruined ancient state. The most ancient-seeming Arashi member. May have been present at the First Great War.

â†’
#6
Unknown Folkwynd (Human)

Lucifer

Arashi Rank #6. Human. Born in Zhuiburn. Incineration Domain produces fire hot enough to burn through magical barriers. Responsible for killing all of Fodon's original leadership structure.

â†’
#7
Unknown Folkwynd (Human)

Biruda

Arashi Rank #7. Folkwynd human. Born in Akison. Trained under Sunlee before joining the Arashi. Oni Form Domain transforms him into a mythological warrior with dark energy that disrupts nearby magic.

â†’
#8
Unknown Folkwynd (Human)

Oto

Arashi Rank #8. Unknown location. Resonance Domain perceives and controls sound frequencies. Can shatter any material by finding its resonant frequency. Most communications-capable Arashi member.

â†’
#9
Unknown Goldhelm

Kaboom

Arashi Rank #9. Goldhelm. Left the Goldhelm Kingdom's scientific research program to join the Arashi. Detonation Domain charges any touched material with explosive potential. Partner of Helm (#12).

â†’
#10
Unknown Folkwynd (Human)

Ryobik

Arashi Rank #10. Unknown location. Chain Domain generates gravitational force chains capable of binding entities far larger and more powerful than the user. The containment specialist of the Arashi.

â†’
#11
Unknown Folkwynd (Human)

Spector

Arashi Rank #11. Lives openly in Andport. Phantom Domain creates perfect physical duplicates of the user. Does not conceal Arashi affiliations in his home city. The most publicly known Arashi member.

â†’
#12
Unknown Goldhelm

Helm

Arashi Rank #12. Goldhelm. Left Ibeson's research program alongside Kaboom. Strategic Domain processes all observable information into real-time optimal tactical analysis. The Arashi's analytical infrastructure.
